title: Michael Zezas: Deciphering the Infrastructure Chess Game
description: Last week, the U.S. Senate advanced both a budget blueprint and a $1 trillion bipartisan infrastructure bill. What can investors expect from the House of Representatives?
itunes:title: Michael Zezas: Deciphering the Infrastructure Chess Game
